buildCommand: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html metadata.json dist/ && sed -i 's|src="/index.tsx"|src="/index.js"|' dist/index.html && ./node_modules/.bin/esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --external:react --external:"react/*" --external:react-dom --external:"react-dom/*" --external:recharts --external:uuid --external:@google/genai
